title: The Grand Reward Strategy!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>*Sigh*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Shizuku-chan, you don’t look so great, what’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ayumu-san…. No, it’s nothing…. Ophelia has a vaccination schedule this week. But Ophelia doesn't really like hospitals…. I can’t bear to look at her sad face<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Is that so…. Even humans don’t like injections, right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That’s right. But this is necessary so that Ophelia can stay healthy! I feel bad for her, but I’ll make sure she gets it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hey, what if you prepare a reward for Ophelia after doing her best on the injection? Something like a homemade treat<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That’s a good idea, Ayumu-san! But homemade, huh…. There are things like chicken jerky, but….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hmm…. Let's look it up…. Ah, there are recipes listed on a veterinarian site. There's this one, sweet potatoes mixed with soy pulp, how about that? Does Ophelia like sweet potatoes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Really!? She loves sweet potatoes, I think she’ll be happy with that!! Now it’s just a matter of if I can make it well….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu, want to practice so you can make it properly, Shizuku-chan? I'll accompany you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
